messages.message: What is the appropriate channel for dogfood issues? I've gotten endless :loading: there for the past few hours on pretty much every action.
dogfood is being deployed right now, so there’s downtime at around this time every day
you can see the deployment schedule in <#CCY413CSU|>
Okay good to know. It hasn't really been operational for me for several hours, but maybe I'm running into multiple issues.
yeah several hours is not expected, but we’ll have to wait around an hour for the current deployment to finish
what page are you trying to access on dogfood?
Most recently just creating a new Solution Builder project. I've also had endless loading on running individual refiner fields, and opening refiner from Solution Builder.
hmm i’m not able to reproduce with my SB project, can you link the exact page you’re having trouble loading?
I can actually reproduce. Looks like a lot of async tasks are not working. When creating a new SB project polling status is stuck at 0.0 progress. Same for uploading documents to SB project

ohh `celery-app-tasks` is just down because of the scipy import error (mentioned here (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1688038794954409) as well)
```ImportError: cannot import name 'pinv2' from 'scipy.linalg'```
@Anil merged the revert, so I guess we just need to wait for the next dogfood deploy in about 2 hours?

Sorry about this :confused:
Checking if there is a way to bring it up with an older image.
Should be fixed in the next deploy as Serena said.
Thanks all, glad it's not just my project.

Things are moving again. There is a backlog of tasks, so things are going to be a little slower for next 10-15 minutes.
https://dogfood.instabase.com/api/v1/jobs/view_scheduler_state  - you can check scheduler state here
